      int getFromSpinner()

      Method that implements the functionality of the right arrow.
      protected void initialize()
      Initialize method that invokes the mainWindowUI as well as the spinners.
      void onSpinnerMouseClick()
      This method sends an error pop up window if the user inputs an incorrect price range.
      void openMap()
      This method changes the middle panel to a map of all boroughs, where the user can select a specific borough
      void openRandomEntryPanel()
      This method opens the fourth panel where the user can get a random listing displayed in a new window on press of a button.
      void PRErrorAction()
      Sends an error dialogue window if the user has an incorrect price range.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<AirbnbListing>> propertyList()
      This method creates an HashMap with borough names as keys and arraylists of listings inside those boroughs as values

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
        Initialize method that invokes the mainWindowUI as well as the spinners. The arrows are initially set to invisible since a price range is yet to be inputted by the user.

        public void PRErrorAction()
                   throws java.lang.Exception

      • onSpinnerMouseClick

        public void onSpinnerMouseClick()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method sends an error pop up window if the user inputs an incorrect price range. While the correct price range is not inputted by the user, the arrows remain invisible.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • propertyList

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<AirbnbListing>> propertyList()
        This method creates an HashMap with borough names as keys and arraylists of listings inside those boroughs as values
        Returns:
        Hashmap with airbnb listings identified by the name of borough.

      • openMap

        public void openMap()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method changes the middle panel to a map of all boroughs, where the user can select a specific borough

      • openRandomEntryPanel

        public void openRandomEntryPanel()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
